target.description: Build all projects which reference this project. Useful to propagate changes.
target.name: build-refprojects

arg.line: -driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table lineitem -baseTbl "tpl_lineitem" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/lineitem.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE lineitem (l_orderkey INT NOT NULL, l_partkey INT NOT NULL, l_suppkey INT NOT NULL, l_linenumber INT NOT NULL, l_quantity INTEGER NOT NULL, l_extendedprice DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, l_discount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, l_tax DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, l_returnflag VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, l_linestatus VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, l_shipdate DATE NOT NULL, l_commitdate DATE NOT NULL, l_receiptdate DATE NOT NULL, l_shipinstruct VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, l_shipmode VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, l_comment VARCHAR(44) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE lineitem ADD CONSTRAINT lineitemkey PRIMARY KEY (l_orderkey,l_linenumber);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table supplier -baseTbl "tpl_supplier" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/supplier.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE supplier (s_suppkey INT NOT NULL, s_name VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, s_address VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, s_nationkey INT NOT NULL, s_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, s_acctbal DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, s_comment VARCHAR(101) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE supplier ADD CONSTRAINT suppkey PRIMARY KEY (s_suppkey); ALTER TABLE partsupp ADD CONSTRAINT partsupp_suppkey FOREIGN KEY (ps_suppkey) REFERENCES supplier (s_suppkey); ALTER TABLE lineitem ADD CONSTRAINT lineitem_suppkey FOREIGN KEY (l_suppkey) REFERENCES supplier (s_suppkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table region -baseTbl "tpl_region" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/region.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE region (r_regionkey INT NOT NULL, r_name VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, r_comment VARCHAR(152) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE region ADD CONSTRAINT regionkey PRIMARY KEY (r_regionkey); ALTER TABLE nation ADD CONSTRAINT nation_regionkey FOREIGN KEY (n_regionkey) REFERENCES region (r_regionkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table partsupp -baseTbl "tpl_partsupp" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/partsupp.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE partsupp (ps_partkey INT NOT NULL, ps_suppkey INT NOT NULL, ps_availqty INT NOT NULL, ps_supplycost DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, ps_comment VARCHAR(199) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE partsupp ADD CONSTRAINT partsuppkey PRIMARY KEY (ps_partkey, ps_suppkey); ALTER TABLE lineitem ADD CONSTRAINT lineitem_partsuppkey FOREIGN KEY (l_partkey,l_suppkey) REFERENCES partsupp (ps_partkey,ps_suppkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table orders -baseTbl "tpl_orders" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/orders.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE orders (o_orderkey INT NOT NULL, o_custkey INT NOT NULL, o_orderstatus VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, o_totalprice DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, o_orderdate DATE NOT NULL, o_orderpriority VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, o_clerk VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, o_shippriority INT NOT NULL, o_comment VARCHAR(79) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE orders ADD CONSTRAINT orderkey PRIMARY KEY (o_orderkey); ALTER TABLE lineitem ADD CONSTRAINT lineitem_orderkey FOREIGN KEY (l_orderkey) REFERENCES orders (o_orderkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table customer -baseTbl "tpl_customer" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/customer.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE customer (c_custkey INT NOT NULL, c_name VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, c_address VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, c_nationkey INT NOT NULL, c_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, c_acctbal DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, c_mktsegment VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, c_comment VARCHAR(117) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE customer ADD CONSTRAINT custkey PRIMARY KEY (c_custkey); ALTER TABLE orders ADD CONSTRAINT order_custkey FOREIGN KEY (o_custkey) REFERENCES customer (c_custkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table nation -baseTbl "tpl_nation" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/nation.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE nation (n_nationkey INT NOT NULL, n_name VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, n_regionkey INT NOT NULL, n_comment VARCHAR(152) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE nation ADD CONSTRAINT nationkey PRIMARY KEY (n_nationkey); ALTER TABLE supplier ADD CONSTRAINT supplier_nationkey FOREIGN KEY (s_nationkey) REFERENCES nation (n_nationkey); ALTER TABLE customer ADD CONSTRAINT customer_nationkey FOREIGN KEY (c_nationkey) REFERENCES nation (n_nationkey);"

-driver "nl.cwi.monetdb.jdbc.MonetDriver" -connectUrl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -table part -baseTbl "tpl_part" -csv "/usr/local/src/tpch/SF-001/part.tbl" -createTbl "CREATE TABLE part (p_partkey INT NOT NULL, p_name VARCHAR(55) NOT NULL, p_mfgr VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, p_brand VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, p_type VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL, p_size INT NOT NULL, p_container VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, p_retailprice DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, p_comment VARCHAR(23) NOT NULL)" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb -fieldSep "|" -recSep "|\n" -alterTbl "ALTER TABLE part ADD CONSTRAINT partkey PRIMARY KEY (p_partkey); ALTER TABLE partsupp ADD CONSTRAINT partsupp_partkey FOREIGN KEY (ps_partkey) REFERENCES part (p_partkey); ALTER TABLE lineitem ADD CONSTRAINT lineitem_partkey FOREIGN KEY (l_partkey) REFERENCES part (p_partkey);"
-primarydburl "jdbc:monetdb://localhost/tpch001" -user monetdb -passwd monetdb register cluster replica replica1 replica2
-tpltblPrefix "tpl_" register partitioned table lineitem orders partsupp part customer supplier nation region
